summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Fractal V2.1 navigation reorganization. All requirements met: Fractal successfully moved to main sidebar level under FOMO AI with correct badge, sub-tabs, and routing functionality.

design_issues.issue: Badge colors were hardcoded to blue instead of using the badgeColor property

passed_tests: ✅ Fractal positioned as main tab under FOMO AI, above On-chain
✅ Fractal has NEW badge with correct orange/amber color (after fix)
✅ Fractal expands to show sub-tabs: Dashboard, Signal, Matches, Backtest
✅ /fractal route loads with internal tabs and active Dashboard
✅ /fractal/signal route works with active Signal tab
✅ /fractal/matches route works with active Matches tab
✅ /fractal/backtest route works with active Backtest tab
✅ Intelligence section does NOT contain Fractal
✅ /admin/fractal route works with institutional admin panel
✅ All Fractal functionality working (charts, data, controls)
